mapper.select: select pi.ward_code "key" ,pi.ward_name "value" from (select distinct ward_code from orders_m where NURSE = #{userName}) om inner join (select distinct ward_code,ward_name from patient_info) pi on om.ward_code = pi.ward_code

select pi.patient_id "patientId",visit_id "visitId",pi.name,pi.sex,pi.inp_no "inpNo",pi.bed_no "bedNo",pi.dept_code "wardCode", pi.dept_name "wardName",pi.doctor_in_charge "doctorCode",pi.date_of_birth "birthDay",pi.admission_date_time "admissionDate", pi.diagnosis from patient_info pi where ward_code = #{wardCode}
and pi.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or pi.bed_no = #{keyword} or pi.inp_no like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
